home__description: Looking for an opportunity where I can put my abilities to work and who knows, maybe change the world by the way
about__description:
I am currently pursuing a Master's in Computer Science at Georgia Tech.

Previously, I worked as a C++ backend engineer at Alibaba Group. I succeeded in Request for Quotation project and had contributed to the development of a push system using Content-Based Recommendations.

I am actively seeking for intern opportunity for 2025 Summer. Please feel free to reach out to me if you believe I am a good fit for your team:)
qualification2__subtitle: University of Illinois at Urbana Champaign
qualification2_1__subtitle: University of Illinois at Urbana Champaign
portfolio1__description: A multi-threaded pair of client / server interact with each other using the customized GETFILE protocol.
portfolio2__description: A distributed file system where a client connects to a remote server via gRPC framework. The client sends asynchronous requests to the server and updates its local file system accordingly.
portfolio3__description: Built a predictive model by testing 30+ variables with lasso, XGBoost, regression analysis, and cross-validation-approach to determine a fair market value; ranked top 3 in class.
portfolio_more1_description: The multithreaded proxy server acts as a mediator, handling requests from clients to servers. File transfer between multithreaded client/server via proxy/cache using IPC.
portfolio_more2_description: A simplified, distributed version of the Spanning Tree Protocol that can be run on an arbitrary layer 2 network topology. Simulate the communications between switches with Messages.
portfolio_more3_description: A distributed Bellman-Ford algorithm and use it to calculate routing paths in a network.
portfolio_more4_description: Use Software Defined Networking (SDN) principles to create a configurable firewall using an OpenFlow enabled Switch.
portfolio_more5_description: Use the BGPStream tool and its Python interface PyBGPStream to understand the BGP protocol and interact with BGP data. The goal is to gain a better understanding of BGP.
